tool_description:
Lufthansa Open API is the Open Data platform of Lufthansa group together with Lufthansa Innovation Hub! 
Lufthansa Groups data offering spans from industry wide reference data over Lufthansa Group airlines till Lufthansa Cargo shipping information. 
Make sure to follow, as we are continuously expanding the offering!
Plus the API is free off charge!
name: Lufthansa Open Deprecated
title: Lufthansa Open Deprecated

api_list.name: Country Code
api_list.description: List all countries or one specific country. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

optional_parameters.name: Offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

api_list.name: Citycode
api_list.description: List all cities or one specific city. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

api_list.name: Airports
api_list.description: "List all airports or one specific airport. All airports response is very large. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0

optional_parameters.name: LHoperated
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the results to locations with flights operated by LH (false=0, true=1)

api_list.name: Nearest Aiports
api_list.description: List the 5 closest airports to the given latitude and longitude, irrespective of the radius of the reference point.

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude in decimal format to at most 3 decimal place

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude in decimal format to at most 3 decimal place

api_list.name: Airline Code
api_list.description: List all airlines or one specific airline.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0

api_list.name: Aircraft
api_list.description: List all aircraft types or one specific aircraft type.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0

api_list.name: Seatmap

required_parameters.name: flightnumber
required_parameters.description: Flight number including carrier code and any suffix (e.g. 'LH2037')

api_list.name: Lounges
Flightstatus
api_list.description: Status of a particular flight (boarding, delayed, etc.).

required_parameters.name: flightnumber
required_parameters.description: Flight number including carrier code and any suffix (e.g. 'LH400')

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The departure date (YYYY-MM-DD) in the local time of the departure airport

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
